titleStmt.title: Of all blasing starrs in generall, as well supernaturall as naturall, to what countrie or people so euer they appeare in the world vniuersall. The iudgement of the right reuerend Frederike Nause, Bishop of Vienna. Written and dedicated to the most high and puissaunt Emperour Ferdinand. Translated out of Latine into English, by Abraham Fleming
Super huis anni post Christum natum M.D.XXXI. & quolibet alio cometa exploratio. English
titleStmt.author: Nausea, Friedrich, d. 1552.
Fleming, Abraham, 1552?-1607.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Super huis anni post Christum natum M.D.XXXI. & quolibet alio cometa exploratio.

Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
